Package odu.edu.cs.cs350.pne

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • odu.edu.cs.cs350.pne.Document
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArffDocument, ClassifyDocument, TrainDocument
    public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
    A Document is a general object used for storing a document's raw text, category, and functional signature. Document is a super class for TrainDocument, ClassifyDocument, and ArffDocument.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.lang.String category
      The associated category(classificiation) of a document.
      protected java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​WordInfo> tokenMap
      The functional signature of a document, storing each significant word along with its count, normalized count, and term weight.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Document​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String category)
      Creates a Document with specified raw text and a category.

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(java.lang.String word)
        Returns true if the document's tokenMap contains the word, false if not.
        Parameters:
        word - A word that is searched for in the document's tokenMap
        Returns:
        true if Document contains the word, false if not

      • trimText

        public java.lang.String trimText​(java.lang.String rawText)
        Converts raw text to lowercase and removes all punctuation, numbers, and extraneous white space.
        Parameters:
        rawText - The raw text to be trimmed
        Returns:
        Trimmed raw text text

      • calculateTermWeights

        public void calculateTermWeights​(VocabCollection vocab)
        Calculates the term weight for each word in the document's tokenMap. The term weight is the product of the words normalized count and the inverse document frequency of the word in a VocabCollection.
        Parameters:
        vocab - The VocabCollection that contains the inverse document frequencies

      • getRawText

        public java.lang.String getRawText()
        Returns the raw text of a document.
        Returns:
        The raw text

        Sets the category of this document.
        Parameters:
        newCategory - The category being assigned

      • getCategory

        Returns the category of this document.
        Returns:

      • getTokenMap

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​WordInfo> getTokenMap()
        Returns the token map of this document.
        Returns:
        The token map of this document

      • getWordWeight

        public double getWordWeight​(java.lang.String word)
        Returns the word weight of a word stored in this document's token map.
        Parameters:
        word - A word in this document's token map
        Returns:
        The term weight of the word specified as a parameter
